      • getScope

        public String getScope()
        Get the space-delimited scope list (= the value of scope parameter (OPTIONAL parameter)).

        RFC 6749 (OAuth 2.0), 3.3. Access Token Scope says "The value of the scope parameter is expressed as a list of space-delimited, case-sensitive strings." However, Facebook does not comply with this specification and uses a comma (0x2C) as the delimiter. Therefore, this method returns a comma-delimited scope list if this AccessToken instance was built from a response from Facebook.

        Returns:
        The space-delimited scope list.

      • setScope

        public AccessToken setScope(String scope)
        Set the space-delimited scope list (= the value of scope parameter (OPTIONAL parameter)).
        Parameters:
        scope - The space-delimited scope list.
        Returns:
        this object.
